title: HoP 158 - Born Under a Bad Sign - Freedom and Astrology in Jewish Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 158 - Born Under a Bad Sign - Freedom and Astrology in Jewish Philosophy
description: Abraham Ibn Ezra, Ibn Daud and Maimonides consider the philosophical implications of astrology as science flourishes in the Jewish culture of Andalusia.
